cleaned_text: Tool / Analytical tools EX-Ante Carbon Balance Tool (EX-ACT), version 9 The Ex-Ante Carbon-balance Tool (EX-ACT) is an appraisal system that provides estimates of the impact of agriculture and forestry development projects, programmes and policies on the carbon-balance. The carbon-balance is defined as the net balance from all greenhouse gases (GHGs) expressed in CO2 equivalent that CO2, as well as GHG per unit to prioritize project terms.
